text: Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupe≈Çniania profilu na ratebeer.

Bottles (three). The following is a compilation of a dozen peoples¬í thoughts who shared this brew with me at my first (and perhaps last?) Malt Liquor Dexterity Games Tournament to celebrate my birthday. Keeping in mind that most of the participants are not regular beer raters, here we go: dark amber body, sweet sponge toffee, light marmalade, sticky and doughy, no hint of the ABV, actually very tasty regardless of the style, barleywinish, sweet fruity malty muddy, english hops?, sweetness gets cloying, spicy notes, Dave from Wendy¬ís first, not horrible but a little flat, surprisingly I enjoyed this, great flavour and scent, caramel soft nice, sweet and strong and deep and dark, makes my mouth malty, pretty smooth for a malt.
user_location: the land of bitumen, beef & beer, Alberta, CANADA

text: Bottled. Pours hazy amber with an average off-white head. Aroma of citrus notes, grass and a little caramel. Sweet flavor that ends up more dry and decent bitter. Medium bodied, oily texture and soft carbonation. A nice brew. üåüüåüüåü
Tht march. Sampled from bottle. Dark amber, sweet rye malty, caramel, sweet with light bitter.
light sweet grass aroma,golden, clear, tan foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, light body, oily feel, soft carbonation, light sweet malty finish.

Bottle at THT. Slight hazy amber with bubbly off white head. Quite some hops up front, grassy, lime, soap, cardboard, honey, sweet malts and some alcohol. Quite sweet and bitter. Almost full bodied. Not that good but the decent hops make up for a less than mediocre base.

Bottle shared at THT. Very hazy amber with an off white head. Aroma of fruity hops, caramel malt and citrus. Flavour is over moderate sweet and bitter. Medium bodied with a light juicy hop palate and soft carbonation.

Bottle. Creamy White good mostly lasting head. Amber colour. Moderate malty nand hoppy aroma. Moderate bitter flavor. Average moderate bitter finish. Creamy palate. not too alcoholic. Average moderate bitter finish. Creamy palate.

Bottle shared at March THT.
Thin white head. very hazy amber pour. Hoppy aftertaste. Pretty decent

Aroma: Jujube and some alc booze

Appearance: Pale amber colour

Taste: Heavy malty sweet

Palate: Medium full body, juicy texture, soft carbonation and the Aroma finishes
Bottle. Copper color. Aroma of peach, caramel and some tropical notes. Fresh taste of peach, citrus, malt, grain and caramel. Not bad, first malt liquor I actually liked.

Limpido color ambrato, schiuma biancastra mediamente persistente. Morbida e fruttata, malto, miele, pesche; profumo fresco e sapore dolce ma non stucchevole. Corpo medio, oleosa, strutturata, curiosamente dissetante. Finale piacevolmente pulito e leggermente amarognolo, ma "Luppolo" non pervenuto.

330 ml bottle. Unclear dark orange body with a big, dense tan head. Aroma is quite heavy on the malt and caramel side but also some dry fruit, peach and oranges. Flavor is sweet malt, caramel, lots of dry fruit, some citric fruit, oranges and bitterness. Alcohol is pretty well hidden. Full bodied and long lasting sweet aftertaste with more evident bitterness. Pretty solid.

0.33 l bottle from ¬íSterk Avondverkoop¬í, best before February 2016. Clear, golden orange with a huge, frothy, almost stable, tan head. Sweetish-fruity aroma of mango, orange, strawberry, redcurrant and some pine. Sweetish, fruity-resiny taste of mango, orange, pine and some caramel, followed by a short, sweetish-bitter and minimally warming finish. Medium to full body, creamy and slightly effervescent mouthfeel, average carbonation. Very nice stuff, resembles an IIPA in fruitiness and body, although maybe a little less bitter.
Bottle. Pours a golden color with a small white head. Has a fruity malty caramel aroma. Fruity malty weak sugary caramel flavor. Has a fruity malty caramel finish.

Bottle. Pours amber with an off-white head. Aroma of malt, peach, dried fruits and caramel. Flavor is sweet and malty with some citrus,orange, dried fruits and bitterness.Medium body, average carbonation.

33cl bottle at home from Biernavigatie.nl. Body is opalescent amber, head is big, cream white, rocky, mostly lasting, excellent lacing. Nose is sweetish malty, flavor is caramel, fruity, biscuit, pine resin, honey. Medium to heavy sweet, light bitter, hint of fruity sour. Finish is long lasting hoppy medium bittersweet, developing hoppy bitterness, alcohol is completely hidden. Full body, creamy texture, soft carbonation. Easy dessert beer, very tasty, not disturbingly sweet, interesting, great one.

Bottle 330 ml, pours dark orange with high foamy beige head that reduces to a fine lacing after a while. Aroma of caramel, brown sugar, tropical fruits, red currant, plums and toast. In taste very high sweetness with light bitter finish and a slightly sour aftertaste. Very warming. Quite good drinkable considering the liquerish sweetness and high abv.

UPDATED: FEB 13, 2016 Ambrata, schiuma cremosa abbondante.
Profumo molto intenso floreale, fruttato, frutta tropicale, erbaceo ,agrumato.
In bocca sapore molto dolce alla frutta tropicale, ananas, finale molto amaro agrumato. L¬íalcool √® molto ben nascosto.
Profumi intensi, sapori dolci molto pronunciati e finale amarissimo: una birra superlativa!

Bottle, 9%. Hazy orange with big tan head. Aroma is malt, caramel, peach, hop, little toasted and pineapple. Flavour is malt, fruit, caramel, toasted, little candy, peach, hop, sweet and medium bitter.
Bottle 0.33l. Cloudy dirty yellow/brownish liquid with big foam. Fruity aroma. Medium body, light carbonation. Fruity taste with a hint of herby bitterness.

Bottle 33cl. Hazy dark amber colour with a medium sized off-white head. Smells hops, sweet, malts, alcohol. Medium to full body with light carbonation. Tastes very sweet, malts, some hops, slightly fruity. Easy drinkable, abv is nicely disguised. Agiod beer in his kind.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Hazy amber color, average sized white head. Nice retention. Sweet, and fruity, dull, syrupy, some hoppiness. Taste is similar. Strong apricot presence, very sweet and malty with some hoppy undertones. Medium to full bodied, average carbonation. OK.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
Hazy honey color. Lots and lots of malt and malty sweetness. Some hops in aroma, bit boozy taste with hints of bitterness, medium body, soft carbonation. //svijet piva
Weich malziger, gleichzeitig stark hopfiger Antrunk. Grasig, die S√º√üe ist eher verhalten. Angenehme Intensit√§t, in der der Hopfen weiter hervorsticht. Gut! 11/11/12/12/9/11

Bottle. Pours a clear light brown beer with a big, off white head on top. Aroma is rather malty and boozy with sweet, sugary notes in there as well. Flavor is quite strong, sweet, light fruity with a nice boozy note in it that adds the Oomph. Far better than I¬íd expected it to be. Quite ok.
ath home along with Yves. amber coloured body with a white head and a yeast malt hops aroma a sweet caramel malt hop fruity alcholic bitter taste with a alcholic bitter finish
Shared with wim at wim¬ís place. Amber colored beer with small white head lots of carbonation. Hopped fruited aroma. Finish is sweet hopped.
Hazy orange with a big off-white head. Aroma is caramel, malt and pineapple. Taste is malt, caramel and syrup.

Bottle at S&G Mikkeller tasting (and some others).
APPEARANCE: clear darker blond beer, nice stable white head.
NOSE: hoppy, fruity, sweet, caramel.
TASTE: hoppy, fruity, sweet, caramel.

(Mikkeller MAD4 Malt Liquor) Bottle 330 ml at home, served into a tulip, no paper bags around. ABV 9%
Deep orange colour on the body, tall and thick, creamy head on top, wiht very good retention, leaving heavy lacing on the glass.
Very nice aroma, lots of fruity notes present, mostly tropical fruits, light caramel malts.
Very sweet taste, lots of sugar in there, syrup, but also hoppy touches, with tropical fruits once again, pineapple, even some light melon, caramel, alcohol.
Medium body with good carbonation.
Quite good, pretty sure this is not your typical malt liquor.I wouldn¬ít mind having more of this.

UPDATED: MAY 22, 2015 Bottle. Hazy deep amber liquid with medium off-white head. Aroma of citrus, raw sugar, raisins, alcohol and toffee. Taste is light to medium sweet and light bitter with notes of toffee, raw sugar and floral hops. Medium bodied with medium to high carbonation. Decent but not true to style. MALT LIKKA TICK FUCK YEAR
Brown, slightly unclear with almost no head. Slightly leafy and slightly malty aroma. Taste is booze, pine needles, and malts. Sparkly.
Bottle with dutchdrebus and benzai. Brown/orange color with a beige head. Smells and tastes malty, sweet, hoppy, fruity, grassy.

Bottle @ home. Hazy dark amber colour with a medium sized off-white head. Smells hops, sweet, malts, alcohol. Tastes very sweet, malts, some hops, slightly fruity. The hops are nice, the overly sweet part is slightly annoying. Full body, soft carbo.

Bottle @ weekly tasting shared by Dutchdrebus. Clear dark orange to light reddish color, medium to full sized off-white head that lasts for quite a long time. Aroma is dull, malts, leaves, sweetish. Taste malts, sweetish, all of a sudden some hops come through, a distant hint of bitterness and the same distant hint of overripe fruit. Not your typical malt liquor.

Bottle sample at a tasting. Thanks Stas & Vova. Hazy orange with a big off-white head. Aroma of citrus hops, pine and caramel. Sweet, quite malty, some fruitiness, a bit astringent and grainy with medium bitterness in the finish. Medium-bodied, sticky on palate.
Fonefan 251014. Deep golden colour with an off-white head. Aroma is fruit, malt, alcohol, peaches. Flavour is sweet, malt, fruit, alcohol, sugar, peaches, pine, orange. OK beer.

Bottle sample at a tasting at Yoav¬ís place. Thanks Stas & Vova. Hazy amber, white head. Hoppy, some citrus, also some peach and pear in the nose, sweet, slightly bitter, a little honey taste. Light-to-medium body, mild carbonation, fruity finish.

Bottle sample at a tasting at Yoav¬ís place. Thanks Stas & Vova. Hazy golden. Aroma of malt, a bit of honey, some fruitiness, somewhat stale hops and a bit of alcohol. Sweetish flavor with malt, a honey hint, nicy juicy fruity hops, an alcoholic note, and a bitterish finish. Medium-bodied. Quite decent.

Bottle. Pours hazy reddish orange, medium creamy off-white head, dissipates fairly quickly, good lacing. Aroma is pretty heavy pine, some citrus, grains. Flavor is medium plus sweet, medium bitter, caramel, sugars, lots of biting pine, some citrus. Medium body, lingering sickly bitter mouthfeel. Odd.
Hazy orange with a lasting off-white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, caramel and moderate hoppy - peach and grapefruit. Flavor is quite sweet and rather bitter. Dry and rather bitter finish.

Barwa: ciemno z≈Çota, lekko zmƒôtniona.
Piana: obfita, jasno kremowa, na poczƒÖtku drobnopƒôcherzykowa, jednak szybko siƒô dziurawi i znika. 
Zapach: intensywny ameryka≈Ñski chmiel, cytrusy, ≈º√≥≈Çte owoce, ≈ºywice. Ca≈Ço≈õƒá sprawia wra≈ºenie likieru chmielowego kojarzƒÖcego siƒô z DIPA. Alkohol niewyczuwalny. 
Smak: lekka pe≈Çnia s≈Çodowa, niezalepiajƒÖca, skontrowana przyjemnƒÖ goryczkƒÖ o cytrusowym charakterze. Ca≈Ço≈õƒá bardzo dobrze zgrana, piwo bardzo pijalne. Tutaj r√≥wnie≈º alkohol niewyczuwalny. 
Wysycenie: ≈õrednie w stronƒô wysokiego, odpowiednie.
330 ml bottle. Hazy, light amber with small white head, Aroma of mango, orange. Semi dry, medium sweet, well hidden alcohol. Full oily body. Light bitter finnish.

27th January 2015Light haze on this deep amber beer, tidy cream colour head. Smooth palate, semi dry with decent fine carbonation. Sweetish dry malts, trace of caramel. Turns savoury before orange and marmalade hops kick in. Light finish with a mild peel bitter linger. Somewhat barleywine like but certainly one of the better Malt Liquors I¬íve had.

Bottle. Pours in dark amber body with medium frosty head. Aroma is malty, honey, bready. Taste has high malty sweetness with medium harsh earthy bitterness. Light fruity after taste. Body is full, oily, low to medium carbonation.

Color √°mbar limpio con espuma marfil compacta, algo jabonosa. Aromas afrutados de √©steres y l√∫pulo c√≠trico. Cuerpo medio y maltoso, nuevamente afrutado, con cierto toque de medicina o met√°lico y toque c√≠trico. final seco medio.

33cl bottle. Pours hazy amber with a beautiful creamy slightly off white head. Aroma is sweet malt, caramel, toffee, some tropical fruits, light alcohol. Taste is similar with a bold malty sweetness, sweet fruity notes, some resinous hops. Light final bitterness, very well hidden 9 ABV. Medium to full body, medium carbonation.

Bottle at Ungstrup.
Clear amber colored with a medium sized white head.
Fruity aroma of caramel and hops with notes of grass.
Sweet and fruity flavor of caramel and hops with notes of grass.
Sweet and hoppy finish.
Bottled. A hazy amber beer with a huge beige head. The aroma has notes of alcohol and caramel. The flavor is sweet with notes of alcohol, caramel, and malt, leading to a bitter finish.

Ins Glas ergie√üt sich ein leicht tr√ºbes orangegelbes Bier mit einer sch√∂nen wei√üen Schaumkrone. Geruch kr√§fttig malzig, viel Getreide, ordentlich hopfig, reife Fr√ºchte. Geschmack s√º√ü malzig, etwas Zucker, reife Fr√ºchte, leicht alkoholisch, dezent hopfig, sehr interessantes und leckeres Bier.

duft meget s√∏d, lidt karamel. frisk humle. 
smag: malt s√∏dme. godt med humle smag jordb√¶r lidt appelsin lidt grapfrugt,
Amber/deep orange colour, quite good head. Strong malty aroma, caramel and some tropical fruits and herbs. Sweet taste, some herbs and low but nice bitterness

330 ml. bottle bought @ De Caigny Drankenhandel. Shared with people @ O.B.E.R. Kestbierfestival 2014. Craft Malt Liquor, finally. Hazy amber tanned head. Nose is typically hop character, grapefruit & pine mixed with sticky & goopy malt. Taste is an interesting mix of cheap sugar sticky malt with bitter grapefruit peel, pine, resin hops, sweet & bitter. Interesting. Body is thick syrupy malt. Interesting Malt Liquor IPA hybrid.

Botella de 33 cl de cervezalandia tomada el 07-12-2014 en el momento. Lote 1 hasta 04-02-2016. Color √°mbar oscuro a marr√≥n algo turbia con espuma beige persistente. Aromas maltosos dulces con toques ligeros herb√°ceos. Sabores maltosos ligeramente tostados y caramelizados. Toques ligeros herb√°ceos y suave final amargo. Cuerpo medio con unos buenos 9 vol y algo pastoso y denso. buena y original, para repetir.

Aroma of sweet malt, caramel, candy sugar, dried fruits, hops. Flavour is quite sweet with a light to moderate bittersweet finish. Not bad for a Malt Liquor, in fact I like the use of hops, but the cloying sweetness is another matter. Nice try though Mikkeller, I see that most users who¬íve had it enjoy this one.
Bottle at Mikkeller. Clear amber/brown - white head. Grassy. Caramel. Sweetness. Berries. Ok hoppy. Citrus. Alcoholic. Sugar - brown sugar. Wet dog aroma. Acid. Vanilla. Labre laver.
Bottle at Craig¬ís...coffee stone cleaner aroma...candy sugar sweetness...bit too sweet for me
Bottle at Craig¬ís. Pours with haft brown with a thin white head. Aromas of stewed apples, toffee. Taste is sweet. Iffy.
Bottle. Golden amber with white head. Aroma of grapefruit and pine. Taste of resinous pine, toffee. Quite bitter.
Bottle at Craig¬ís. Pours amber, nose is sweet, malty, pine, taste is dry, pine, sweet toffee, juicy.
bottle at home .. copper ... thick white head ... soft zezty lime nose ... dry fruits .. juicy lime fruits .. floraal oily oranage .. sweet fruits .. nice

330 ml bottle. Pours a dark copper amber colour with a small head. Aroma of rich floral notes, orange, grapefruit and some berries. Flavour of strong floral hops, citrus, some grainy malts, some mild berries and earth. Medium bodied and a sweet, floral, bitter finish. Alcohol warms. For a malt liquor this is surprisingly enjoyable.

33 cl bottle.
Pours slightly hazy copper color with a large off-white head. Nice fruity aroma with sweet malts, caramel, some molasses and loads of floral hops. Surprisingly fruity flavor, juicy even, some sweet malt notes with subtle wooden notes. Very nice and definitely a positive surprise.
4415

malty, caramel aroma with some hoppy notes; amber, clear, medium white foam; medium sweetness, light bitterness; medium body, oily and alcoholic feel, average carbonation, long sweetish finish;
Overall: heavy, noticeable alcohol, rather one-dimensional yet not bad

330ml bottle pours a pale amber color with a finger of white head that leaves some spotted lacing on the glass. Aroma is caramel and citrus with some grainy notes. Taste is a light citrus hop bitterness with a caramel malty sweetness. Medium bodied with mild carbonation. A decent malt liquor made better with a good presence of hops. Well done.

Bottled 330ml. -from Svijet Piva Zagreb. Clear amber coloured, small off-white head, slight perfumed grapefruity hoppy nose. Sweet malty, caramel, lingering grapefruity hoppy and some alcohol with slight sugary notes. Also noticable alcohol in the aftertaste. All in all just another very good Mikkeller.

Dobre smaczne piwo o zapachu grejfrutow co jest chyba sprawa dodania amerykanskich chmieli. Piana fajna trwala i gesta. Kolor bursztynowo rozowawy. Karmelowe i smak toffi wyczulem. Troche kandyzowanego cukru. Chmiel takze byl obecny ale nie byl dominujacy. Malt Liquor chyba jeden z lepszych jakie pilem.

Bottle 330ml. [ As Mikkeller MAD4 Malt Liquor ].Clear medium amber orange color with a average to large, frothy, good lacing, mostly to fully lasting, light beige to off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, caramel, sweet malt, moderate to heavy hoppy, alcohl, grass, orange - citrus, peach. Flavour is moderate to heavy sweet and moderate bitter with a long duration, hop bitter, riped fruit - malt sweet, sugary. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft. [20141025]

33 cl bottle @ home. Pours slightly cloudy golden amber with a little sediment and white head that leaves some lacing. Aroma and flavour are malt, caramel, and citrus - with a slightly bitter finish. ABV is pretty well hidden.

Bottle 330ml @ fonefan
Pours hazy deep golden/copper with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of malt, peach, orange, grape and alcohol. Taste is medium sweet and medium bitter with a long warm, fruity and slightly bitter finish. Body is medium, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottle. It pours an almost clear body, some microfloaties, dark golden to amber in color. A small off-white head sits on top. There¬ís a quite heavy maltyness in the back of the arome, with peachey, piney hops up front. Full body, soft carbonation and not much alcohol warmth considering the ABV. Pine cones and oranges in the flavor, on a sweet malty backdrop. Lasting finish which is mostly on the hoppy side. A quite decent beer, but not interesting. 141025

Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Hazy orange with a lasting off-white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, caramel and moderate hoppy - peach and grapefruit. Flavor is quite sweet and rather bitter. Dry and rather bitter finish. 251014
33cl bottle from cerveteca Lisboa. Copper. Large white head. Taste is light to medium sweet and bitter. Aroma is malty, hoppy, light alcohol.

September 10, 2014. Bottle, best before february 4, 2016. Pours amber with a large dense off-white head. Aroma is fruity esters, pear, soap, caramel, floral. Taste is medium sweet floral and fruity, light bitter. Finish is light bitter, malty and alcohol notes. Medium bodied, soft carbonation.
Noe dunkel farve med lys beige skum. Lukt av gress, sitrus og honning. Smak av malt, honning og sitrus. Fruktig. Melkebaren.
Syrlig duft av h√∏y, kattepiss og citrus. Dunkel gulbrun farge. Tynn hinne skum, heng langs kant. Fruktig smak av fresken og citrus.

Bottle at home. Medium high lasting fluffy white head. Hazy amber body. Sweet apple pear peach aroma Heavily carbonated mildly hopped pretty sweet fruity flavor with long lasting dry finish. Alcohol well hidden by the sweetness.

W aromacie cytrusowy, jest lekka kwa≈õna nuta, jakby octowa, lekko siarkowy, s≈Çodowy, a tak≈ºe wyczuwalny cukier trzcinowy, og√≥lnie bardzo dziwny. Kolo bursztynowy, lekkie zmƒôtnienie, piana ≈õrednio obfita, ale utrzymuje siƒô i oblepia szk≈Ço. W smaku s≈Çodowo≈õƒá, pomieszana z alkoholem i lekkƒÖ siarkƒÖ. Mi≈Ço grzeje w prze≈Çyk, jest s≈Çodkie, goryczka niska, pe≈Çnia srednia ku wysokiej. Dziwne, nienajlepsze.

330ml bottle. Pours slightly hazy dark orange with a large head. Aroma is mango, cheap alcohol and rubbery corn. Taste has sweet mango to start with a harsh grainy mango finish. Feels a touch industrial.

Bottle, 9.0%. Good cat piss hop aroma. Cloudy amber colour. Small off-white head. The flavour is quite malty and peppery. Tastes like an IPA with (too) much alcohol in it. Would have been better with less alcohol, I guess.
Hazy copper, frothy ofwhite head. Sweetish, malty aroma. Bittersweet flavour. Fluffy feel, sweetish and bitter finish.

Bottle @ Wannsinchen / MiP bliver gammel. Pours hazy copper brown with airy but stable off-white head. Clear aroma of malt, caramel and alcohol. Sweet flavour of malt and caramel, with bitter notes of hops and, above all, alcohol. Bitter aftertaste. A decent beer for its style, actually, although I am not a great fan of Malt Liquor.

33 cL bottle @ Wannsinchen / MiP bliver gammel. Pours cloudy orange with a small white head. Aroma is peachy and grapefruity hoppy. Sweet, fruity and toasted malty. Caramelish. Sugarish and sweet finish.
Very poor beer. Tastes like a discount beer, that wants to be special. Metallic and sugary. Bummer.

Bottle. Pours a cloudy amber with tiny off-white head. Aroma is hoppy, fruity, caramel, hints of bread and alcohol. Taste is medium to moderate sweet. Caramel and some dried fruits. Body is bit strange with moderate body that is suddenly exchanged by watery feel. Long bitter finish. Good surprise.
Bottle from Cotteridge Wines; clear golden amber pour with a big frothy white head, pale malt and honey aroma, taste has malts, light lemon, some grain, quite thin on taste but refreshing.

Bottle. Dark amber body with white head. Aroma is malty sweet with some biscuits and herbs. Taste is sweet with some malts and caramel. Aftertaste is sweet balanced by medium bitterness. 16 years ago I had first and until today only malt liquor in Arizona and it wasreally horrible but this one is quite nice more of a barly wine. Nice one.
33 cl bottle from mikkeller shop. Pours golden hazy with rich head. Fruity aroma with bitter fruity taste.

09.09.2014, 0,33l bottle @ home:
Nice creamy mediumlasting head. Aroma is kind of fresh fruity, leafs, fresh hops, sap, dried tropical fruits, grass, sweet citrus, light malts. Taste is slightly sweet, sap, leafs, sugar, light malts, grass, flowers, wet hops, light malts. Medium bitterness, slightly dry mouthfeel. Surprisingly nice...
